|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD 4011 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RB4011iGS+RM |series = RouterBOARD 4011 |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!--TV74011GS-5HQ2HD--> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Annapurna Labs;Alpine AL21400;AL21400-1400; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz<!-- 1.4 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W29N04GVSIAA; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = GigaDevice;GD25LQ80CSIG; |flash2size = 1 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367SB; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8367SB; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 6C:3B:6B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT;;; |stockos = RouterOS;;;
|exp_if_types = SFP+ |exp_sfp_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45 |jtag = yes,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SFP+, PoE, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.88.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!--08/02/2018--> |estreldate = 08/02/2018 |estprice = 199 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''Powerful 10x Gigabit port router with a quad-core 1.4GHz CPU,'' :''1GB RAM, SFP+ 10Gbps cage and desktop case with rack ears''
*[https://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/MikroTik_News ''MikroTik'' Wiki] :CPU: [[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine AL21400 @1.4GHz (Quad Core) <!--(ARM Cortex-A15)--> :Flash: 512MB (NAND), RAM: 1GB (DDR3), 10x GbE LAN, SFP+
